articles.author: Christopher Mele and Sandra E. Garcia
articles.title: Mexican Newspaper Shuts Down, Saying It Is Too Dangerous to Continue
articles.description: The newspaper, Norte, said that the three killings of reporters in March showed that journalism had become a high-risk profession.

articles.author: David Welch,Dana Hull
articles.title: Musk Trolls Shorts as Tesla's Value Hits Record, Passes Ford
articles.description: Tesla Inc.’s Elon Musk poked fun at short sellers as his electric-car maker’s stock surged to a record, vaulting its market value past century-old rival Ford Motor Co.

articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
articles.title: Graphene-based sieve turns seawater into drinking water - BBC News
articles.description: The development could help provide clean drinking water for millions of people who lack access to safe sources.

articles.title: Report: Android overtakes Windows as the internet’s most used operating system
